page.title: 08Farming continued/Industry
page.content: is in Tollerton.Chickens are raised for meat for selling either fresh or frozen.We were allowed to go into the buildings to look at and handle the chickens.The chicks felt like candy floss.The chicks on both farms were fed according to weight and drank from special drinkers where the water trickled into a type of saucer. There are four joiners in Tollerton.One specialises in making fencing and the others in making windows, doors, porches and furniture. One joiner is also an undertaker.Also there are three builders specialising mostly in building houses, extensions and garages. Our local milkman lives in Youlton.He delivers milk to six villages nearby.He gets up at 4.30am and finishes work at 1.00pm.He
